cpp

loading-the-grassy-scenery.cxx

The WindowFramework procedure window->load_model() <WindowFramework::load_model> loads the specified file, in this case the environment.egg file in the models folder. The return value is an object of the .NodePath class, effectively a pointer to the model. Note that filename-syntax uses the forward-slash, even under Windows.

Run the Program

Go ahead and run the program. You should see this:

The rock and tree appear to be hovering. The camera is slightly below ground, and back-face culling is making the ground invisible to us. If we reposition the camera, the terrain will look better.
